content_fields.desc:
Information about the requested key. Required when ``action`` is
``request``.
content_fields.title: RequestedKeyInfo

content_fields.desc: **Required.** ID of the device requesting the key.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc:
**Required.** A random string uniquely identifying the request for a key. If the key is
requested multiple times, it should be reused. It should also reused in order
to cancel a request.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc:
**Required.** The encryption algorithm the requested key in this event is to be used
with.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The room where the key is used.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The Curve25519 key of the device which initiated the session originally.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The ID of the session that the key is for.
content_fields.title: string

desc:
This event type is used to request keys for end-to-end encryption. It is sent as an
unencrypted `to-device`_ event.
